ExtraOpener: ^It's good to unpack, hopefully your mind is at ease after writing!
^If not, that's okay, you've still managed to get a lot down.
NotAsMuch: ^Not much to write there? That's no problem!
^Hopefully your mind feels more at ease.
^If not, that's okay, you've still completed the exercise!
main: ^Thank you for trying out my Mindfulness Programme! <color=
^Have you felt positively since starting the exercise?
YESOPTION: ^That's great! I'm glad my programme has managed to work for you.
^I look forward to seeing you back again!
NOOPTION: ^That's unfortunate that it hasn't worked for you.
^Perhaps the next time around it'll be a more pleasant experience!
